entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cardston 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 6.8°C
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
